org.apache.paimon.io

Class RowDataFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.io.SingleFileWriter<T,R>
      • org.apache.paimon.io.StatsCollectingSingleFileWriter<InternalRow,DataFileMeta>
        • org.apache.paimon.io.RowDataFileWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, FileWriter<InternalRow,DataFileMeta>

    public class RowDataFileWriter
extends StatsCollectingSingleFileWriter<InternalRow,DataFileMeta>
    A StatsCollectingSingleFileWriter to write data files containing InternalRow. Also produces DataFileMeta after writing a file.

      • write

        public void write(InternalRow row)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FileWriter
        Add only one record to this file writer.

        NOTE: If any exception occurs during writing, the writer should clean up useless files for the user.

        Specified by:
        write in interface FileWriter<InternalRow,DataFileMeta>
